title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

11:50 <asyd> hello! how to disable keybindings in xwiki? Unfortunelately, xwiki catchs some keybindings like option+c so I can't type a  :)  
12:06 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
12:15 <@cjdelisle> asyd: you might want to look at the javascript files, especially xwiki.js which is in the /resources/js/ directory on the filesystem  
12:15 <asyd> thanks
